personal.name: Srirama Murthy Chellu
personal.title: AI/ML Engineer also a Data Scientist & Data Analyst
personal.bio: Production focused AI/ML engineer with a bias for elegant systems, clean abstractions, and shipping things that matter. I build at the intersection of machine intelligence and great product.

projects.title: Portfolio Website with Interactive AI Chat using Custom LLM & RAG Engine
projects.description: Production ready AI native personal portfolio website integrating Google Gemini APIs with a lightweight Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system. Features dynamic JSON based context chunking, custom keyword scoring retrieval, model fallback handling, exponential backoff for rate limits, and strict prompt guardrails. Deployed on Vercel with serverless API routes and environment secured LLM integration.
projects.image: /LLM Powered Portfolio Website with Interactive AI Chat & Custom RAG Engine.png

projects.title: GenAI & LLM Assisted Clinical Interpretation of Metagenomic Sequencing Data
projects.description: End-to-end AI-driven clinical decision support system for interpreting metagenomic next-generation sequencing (mNGS) reports. The pipeline integrates microbial signal processing, weighted pathogen ranking, contaminant filtering, host immune response analysis, PubMed-backed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and safety-constrained LLM reasoning to generate structured, literature-grounded infectious disease reports with hallucination controls.

projects.title: Superstore Sales Analysis and Visualization
projects.description: End-to-end sales analytics and ETL project processing 50,000+ retail transactions to uncover revenue trends, category performance drivers, customer retention patterns, and regional profitability insights. Built scalable data pipelines and interactive KPI dashboards to enable standardized performance tracking and data-driven campaign evaluation.

projects.title: Pneumonia Detection Using Chest X-Rays
projects.description: Developed a deep learning-based medical imaging classifier using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) to detect pneumonia from over 5,800 pediatric chest X-ray images. Implemented data augmentation, dropout regularization, and fine-tuning strategies to improve generalization. Achieved 79.17% test accuracy with precision-recall evaluation and 97%+ training accuracy.

projects.title: Inference Optimizer
projects.description: CUDA kernel optimizations + quantization pipeline reducing LLM inference cost by 60% while maintaining 98% of output quality on standard benchmarks.

projects.title: Autonomous Data Labeler
projects.description: Active learning system that uses a weak LLM to propose labels, a human-in-the-loop UI for review, and a strong model to arbitrate — cut labeling cost by 80%.

bullets: Built and maintained backend services and REST APIs in Python using Flask to power real time geospatial volunteer matching, enabling efficient and low latency request routing across active users.

Designed and optimized PostgreSQL schemas on AWS Aurora with spatial indexing to improve nearest neighbor searches and location based filtering, reducing query time and improving system responsiveness.
Refactored SQL queries and backend workflows to remove performance bottlenecks, improving API stability and maintaining reliable data availability under concurrent usage.
Integrated AWS services including Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, and MSK to support a secure microservices architecture with event driven communication patterns.

Contributed to Git based CI/CD workflows with structured pull requests, automated testing pipelines, and deployment validation, while documenting architecture and resolving frontend integration issues using React and JavaScript to improve overall system reliability and maintainability.

workExperience.role: Master of Science in Data Science in Scientific Computing
bullets: Courses: Data Mining, Machine Learning, Regression Analysis, Data Visualization, Security Fundamentals
Collaborated with peers on academic research and capstone problem solving in predictive modeling.

workExperience.company: Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology (GRIET)
bullets: Collected, cleaned, and analyzed event participation data using SQL and Excel across more than 12 technical and cultural programs to support planning and improve decision making.

Built automated dashboards and recurring reports to track engagement trends, participation patterns, sponsorship performance, and key operational metrics, reducing manual reporting effort by 50 percent.
Standardized data preparation, validation, and reporting processes to improve data consistency and helped increase attendee engagement by 30 percent through data informed insights.
Worked closely with sponsorship teams and organizing committees to translate event objectives into clear analytical insights that guided strategic planning and post event evaluation.

Led the planning and execution of workshops and hackathons as Chairperson of IEEE GRSS, while also creating digital promotional assets using Adobe Photoshop and Premiere Pro to maintain consistent branding and documentation.

workExperience.company: Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology (GRIET)
workExperience.role: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering
bullets: Coursework: Signals and Systems, Digital Communications, Probability and Random Processes, Embedded Systems, Microprocessors
Led and organized 20+ technical events as IEEE GRSS Chair, applying data analysis and structured reporting to improve participation and operational efficiency.
